animateColor.expression: If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#3" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#3" ) <= 500))) Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#3" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#3" ) <= 750))) Then 1 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#3" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#3" ) <= 1000))) Then 2 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#3" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#3" ) <= 500))) Then 3 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#3" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#3" ) <= 750))) Then 4 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#3" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#3" ) <= 1000))) Then 5 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) == 0)) Then 6 Else 7

parameter.description: Tag do PID - Endereço PLC - ANA IDENTIFY_121

caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

animateColor.expression: If (({#2.Sts.Alarmado} AND NOT {#2.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} >= 251) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} <= 500)) Then 0 Else If (({#2.Sts.Alarmado} AND NOT {#2.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} >= 501) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} <= 750)) Then 1 Else If (({#2.Sts.Alarmado} AND NOT {#2.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} >= 751) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} <= 1000)) Then 2 Else If (({#2.Sts.Alarmado} AND {#2.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} >= 251) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} <= 500)) Then 3 Else If (({#2.Sts.Alarmado} AND {#2.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} >= 501) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} <= 750)) Then 4 Else If (({#2.Sts.Alarmado} AND {#2.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} >= 751) AND ({#2.Sts.Severidade} <= 1000)) Then 5 Else If (NOT {#2.Sts.Alarmado}) Then 6 Else 7

parameter.value: Controle de temperatura na saída do V-1238001
